events.message: The customer reported a car collision that happened on April 28th, 2024. They provided initial details describing the accident and damages.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the customer's vehicle in a collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the claim and will act as the main point of contact for the customer throughout the process.
Customer received confirmation that their car accident claim was officially acknowledged and entered into the system for processing.
The insurance company requested a police report, photographs of the damaged vehicle, and witness statements related to the accident.
Customer submitted all the requested documents, including the police report and multiple photos showing the collision damage to their car.
An investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle accident commenced to assess liability and extent of damages.
The investigation was successfully completed and determined the other driver was at fault based on the collected evidence.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering the estimated repair costs and rental car reimbursement.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing appreciation for the prompt handling of their claim.
The claim was officially approved for payment after the customer accepted the settlement terms without disputes.
Payment was issued to the customer to cover the car repairs and associated accident costs as outlined in the settlement.
The claim case was closed successfully after all obligations were fulfilled and the customer expressed satisfaction.
The claim file was archived securely in the database for future reference and compliance with record retention policies.
